column4: whu the hell a partition shows up on "df -h" and its not on fdisk table ?
whi the hell a partition shows up on "df -h" and its not on fdisk table ?
how big is it?  is it writeable?
oh I know what it is
no no, the table just displayed minutes ago
mount it and do an ls /mnt/backup
did you buy the system from a manufacturer?
yeah I think its one of those ghosted drives, its a pristine install
well you may want to try and recover it
you may have to use dos fdisk
windows and its ilk like doing non-standard things to confound us
